description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the kernel streaming WOW thunk service driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38134):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates based on your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves an elevation of privilege vulnerability affecting Windows 10 and Windows 11 systems.
- For manual installations, download the update packages from the following links:
  - [Update for Windows 11 Version 24H2: KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
  - [Update for Windows 10 Version 21H2, 22H2: KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782).
  - [Update for Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - [Update for Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows 10 or Windows 11.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
